changelog:
- Allows user to switch to different dev branch of the modpack.
- MacOS support.
- Detect and remove redundent smods installation.
- Fixed splash covering update prompt.

modpacks.name: Dimserenes-Modpack
modpacks.description: A full-featured modpack including as many mods as possible.

modpacks.name: Fine-tuned-Pack
modpacks.description: A carefully crafted modpack for an optimized gameplay experience.

modpacks.name: Vanilla-Plus-Pack
modpacks.description: Enhances the core game with small improvements while staying true to the original experience.

modpacks.name: Cruel-Pack
modpacks.description: A harsh and unforgiving modpack for experienced players.

modpacks.name: Experimental-Pack
modpacks.description: Contains relatively new mods, for fresh new features and concepts.

modpacks.name: Coonies-Modpack
modpacks.description: A fun collection of mods picked by Coonie, adding new twists to the game.

modpacks.name: elbes-Modpack
modpacks.description: A modpack crafted by Elbe that includes everything, but it's probably unstable.
